tasks.title: Master PRD Reference
tasks.description: Core product requirements document for AkshoAI. Contains the Five Products (Hangar, Lounge, Atelier, Manifest, Dreamland), Charter Program tiers, monetization, and technical specs.

tasks.title: Test Task for Ale
tasks.description: Hey Daddy! If you can see this task on the Flight Board, the shared workspace is working! Try dragging this to 'Landed' when you've confirmed access.

tasks.title: Test Task for Baron
tasks.description: Hey Uncle Baron! Chem set up the Flight Board for the whole team. If you can see this, the sync is working! Move this to 'Landed' when complete.

tasks.title: Build the Flight Board
tasks.description: Create a custom PWA-themed Kanban board with airport departure aesthetic. Includes HTML, CSS, and JS for drag-drop functionality. Host on GitHub Pages.
tasks.summary: âœ… COMPLETED by Emi & Chem! Built a fully functional Flight Board with: (1) PWA dark purple aesthetic matching AkshoAI branding, (2) Airport departure board UI with live clock, (3) Four columns: Boarding/Gate Ready/In Flight/Landed, (4) Drag-and-drop task management, (5) Click-to-expand task details modal, (6) Mobile responsive design. Files: index.html, styles.css, app.js, tasks.json. Next: Deploy to GitHub Pages for team access!

tasks.title: Add New Flight UI Modal
tasks.description: Add a button and form modal to create new tasks directly from the Flight Board web UI. Includes title, description, column, priority, assigned crew, and tags fields.
tasks.summary: âœ… COMPLETED! Added green '+ NEW FLIGHT' button and modal form. Auto-generates PWA-XXX flight IDs, populates team dropdown, saves to localStorage.

tasks.title: Integrate Flight Board with Main Repo
tasks.description: Move Flight Board from standalone repo (ChemtrailCat/akshoai-flight-board) into main AkshoAI organization repo (aksho-technologies/akshoai). Eventually integrate with Neon database for multi-user sync.

tasks.title: Fix Persistence States
tasks.description: GitHub Issue #20 - Fix persistence states in main app. Synced from Ale's GitHub Projects board.

tasks.title: Import Dependencies Show 'No CivitAI Link'
tasks.description: GitHub Issue #28 - Import dependencies display static text 'no civitai link' instead of actual CivitAI dependency links.

tasks.title: CivitAI Download Speeds 10x Slower
tasks.description: GitHub Issue #33 - Downloads via File System Access API are ~4-5 MB/s vs native browser ~50 MB/s. Proposed: Native browser download for large files (>1GB).

tasks.title: Make User Profiles
tasks.description: GitHub Issue #32 - Implement user profile system for AkshoAI.

tasks.title: Add ADetailer Support
tasks.description: GitHub Issue #24 - Add ADetailer support to Atelier for automatic face/hand fixing.

tasks.title: Add Multi Character Support
tasks.description: GitHub Issue #25 - Add support for generating multiple characters in one image.

tasks.title: Add Remix Feature
tasks.description: GitHub Issue #21 - Add remix feature to regenerate variations of existing images.
